text:
[Verse]
Neon nights glow bright
Walking streets no end in sight
Feel the rhythm feel the beat
City's pulse beneath my feet

[Verse 2]
Every corner sparks a dream
In this urban jungle scheme
Eyes wide open heart on fire
Reaching higher going higher

[Chorus]
City lights oh city lights
Shining on these summer nights
Dancing free in urban haze
Lost but found in this maze

[Verse 3]
Chasing shadows chasing thrills
Up and down these concrete hills
Echoes of a million souls
Stories left to be told

[Bridge]
Through the alleys through the noise
Finding peace finding poise
In the chaos of the crowd
Singing dreams out loud

[Chorus]
City lights oh city lights
Shining on these summer nights
Dancing free in urban haze
Lost but found in this maze
title: City Lights
